mapper.insert:
insert into order_detail(name, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, number, amount) values
(#{item.name},#{item.image},#{item.orderId},#{item.dishId},#{item.setmealId},#{item.dishFlavor}, #{item.number},#{item.amount})
mapper.select: select od.name, SUM(od.number) as "number" from orders o join order_detail od on o.id = od.order_id where o.order_time between #{begin} and #{end} and o.status = 5 group by od.name order by number desc limit 0,10;
